variants.Description in input context: A30P, A53T, and E46K are missense mutations in SNCA associated with familial Parkinson's disease.

Material used.Material Name: SH-SY5Y (example, not explicitly stated in the text)
Material used.Description: The study used cell lines (e.g., SH-SY5Y) exposed to toxins like MPP+ to assess neuroprotection.

Readout description.Result Description: Mutant variants (A30P, A53T, E46K) showed decreased viability in MPP+-exposed cells compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed (implied by the experimental design).

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate for the MTT assay.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cells were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Untreated cells or cells without MPP+ were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.
